The 1997 TVZ Awards (), later renamed the Multishow Brazilian Music Awards (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow de Música Brasileira), were held on May 21, 1997, at the Ballroom in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. João Marcelo Bôscoli and Alessandra Calor hosted the ceremony.
